author: Amanda Yeo
title: 'Stay the f**k at home': Samuel L. Jackson reads you a sweary, poetic social distancing PSA
description: Almost a decade ago, Samuel L. Jackson's reading of bedtime poem "Go the Fuck to Sleep" captivated the internet. Now the actor has returned to spoken word, presenting author Adam Mansbach's timely new adaptation of the classic: "Stay the Fuck at Home." "The '…
content:
